text: En plongée was a 1926 French film directed by Jacques Robert.Alan Goble, The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film, Berlin, Germany: Walter de Gruyter, p. 166 It was based on Fragments d'épaves, a novel by Bernard Frank. It was shot in Monaco,Dominique Auzias, Jean-Paul Labourdette, Monaco, Paris: Le Petit Futé, 2013, p. 68 but set in Britanny.La pensée de midi, Actes Sud, 2001, Issues 4-6, p. 91 It is a spy film. It was reviewed in Cinémagazine in 1928.Cinémagazine, 1928, Issues 27-39, p. 77 ==Cast== *Lilian Constantini - La princesse Nouriskine *Daniel Mendaille - Maurice de Vergnes, un officier de marine *Pierre Alcover - Howell *Olga Noël - Anna Guérec de Vergnes, la femme de Maurice *Mathilde Alberti - Moussia Fedorovna, une espionne, l'ex fiancée de Maurice *Harry Arbell - Le Bozec *Claire Darcas - Madame Howell *Boris de Fast John *Henri Desmarets - Karl *Jean Napoléon Michel - Frantz *Pierre Séguier - Pierre ==References== ==External links== *imdb Category:1926 films Category:French films Category:French-language films Category:Films shot in Monaco Category:Films set in Brittany Category:1920s spy films Category:French spy films Category:French silent films Category:French black-and-white films
title: En plongée
